prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a teenager man with very dark skin, straight hair, showing a clear fear facial expression (fearful expression), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, cinematic lighting, high dynamic range, 8k master
negative_prompt: low-res, blurry, deformed face, extra fingers, extra limbs, cropped head, over-saturated, watermark, text, logo, jpeg artifacts, disfigured, doll-like, unrealistic skin, severe shadow banding
